titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a special resource study of portions of the Los Angeles coastal area in the State of California to evaluate alternatives for protecting the resources of the coastal area, and for other purposes.
Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area Boundary Adjustment Study Act
Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area Boundary Adjustment Study Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
